name: You Need Me
description:
You Need Me is a asymmetric co op shooter where one player plays with the keyboard and the other with a mouse. Both players have to work together to survive as long as they can. The game features an online leaderboard so try to beat the devs :)

Controlls: Keyboard Player:

Movement: wasd

Aiming: arrowkeys

Shooting: spacebar

Mouse Player:

Click: select and place ability

Drag: ammo pickup to player

Devs:

Jakov Mučnjak - Programming

Antun Mesar - Programming

Jan Kozumplik - Music

Damjan Carev - Art
